${ModID}:AstronomicalClock.NAME: Astronomical Clock
${ModID}:AstronomicalClock.FLAVOR: Once remarkably precise, the clock's movements are erratic and confused.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of turn #b3, draw #b2 cards and gain [E] .

${ModID}:ContinuityRune.NAME: Continuity Rune
${ModID}:ContinuityRune.FLAVOR: A smooth gem with the glyph of Continuity engraved on it. There is no endings nor beginnings.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever a #yDazed would be created, create a random card instead. It becomes #yEthereal.

${ModID}:WindUpButterfly.NAME: Wind-Up Butterfly
${ModID}:WindUpButterfly.FLAVOR: Trying not to cry- It's the first time I say goodbye.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if a card was #yExhausted last turn, draw an additional card.

${ModID}:Raincoat.NAME: Raincoat
${ModID}:Raincoat.FLAVOR: I never believed in moral dilemmas- But I guess you're an exception.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every time you play 5 #yEthereal cards, gain [E] .

${ModID}:Everything.NAME: Everything
${ModID}:Everything.FLAVOR: You slammed the book shut mere moments after opening it, the information contained inside overwhelming.
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card to obtain.

${ModID}:InvertedHourglass.NAME: Inverted Hourglass
${ModID}:InvertedHourglass.FLAVOR: The sand in this hourglass trickles backwards through time, appearing to travel against gravity. What has the sand seen?
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. At the start of combat, shuffle #b3 #yDazed into your draw pile.

${ModID}:Locket.NAME: Locket
${ModID}:Locket.FLAVOR: The pictures in here hold no meaning, and yet, some significance.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, add a random #yEthereal card to your hand.

${ModID}:GiantBow.NAME: Giant Bow
${ModID}:GiantBow.FLAVOR: The bow wraps around your waist, and feels a little ridiculous. However, it seems to slip through time effortlessly.
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you #yWarp each combat, #yWarp 1 additional turn.

${ModID}:PairOfGears.NAME: Pair of Gears
${ModID}:PairOfGears.FLAVOR: The gears are inexplicably linked to each other. They spin at unpredictable yet comforting times.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if there is an #yEthereal card in your hand, you may shuffle a card from your hand into your draw pile.
Choose a card to shuffle into your draw pile.

${ModID}:TheClockworkUniverse.NAME: The Clockwork Universe
${ModID}:TheClockworkUniverse.FLAVOR: The timelines are clear to you now. You fear you will look into this device and see your own death.
DESCRIPTIONS: Replaces #yAstronomical #yClock. At the start of your first 3 turns, draw #b2 cards and gain [E] .

${ModID}:ShatteredGlass.NAME: Shattered Glass
${ModID}:ShatteredGlass.FLAVOR: In the reflections of the glass, you see slightly different versions of yourself.
DESCRIPTIONS: Relic and potion rewards have two choices of equal rarity.
